description:
Witches once blessed the human race with wisdom and peace. But the Redia Empire's "Gear Expansion" brought about a culture of science that far surpassed magic, and witches were viewed as enemies impeding the progress of civilization. Thus began the witch hunts. One human named Adonis, who was raised by a witch named Chloe, swears revenge against the human race that took his beloved mentor from him. What salvation can be found at the end of a bloodbath fueled by utter despair?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Terrorism
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a terrorist or terrorist organization.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Lost Civilization
tags.description: Featuring a civilization with few ruins or records that exist in present day knowledge.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Dystopian
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a society characterized by poverty, squalor or oppression.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Prison
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a prison.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Robots
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid machines.

tags.name: Homeless
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is homeless.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Space
tags.description: Partly or completely set in outer space.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

node.description: [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yoruhashi)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kohno928)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/shukanematsu) | [Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/shu-kanematsu)
Originating from [Nippon Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/22/).

**Education:** Kunitachi College of Music

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/hanae-nakamura)

Hanae Nakamura is a music composer.

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/miki-sakurai)

Miki Sakurai was born in 1991 in Miyagi Prefecture. Graduated from Tokyo University of the Arts. She studied composition with Tatsuhiko Nishioka, Yoshihiko Katori, and electronic acoustic music with Takenobu Mori. While studying at university, she began to play Irish music and produce music for art animation. Currently active in various fields, including theater.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hanahope_2022) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCv8yLmx8ckXPZrxJrTkAh0g) | [Personal YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxle3j_wZffWtRlsBXXRZFQ)

name.native: フーヤエクステンデッド

node.description:
[Website](https://www.wyxt.info/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/wyxt_official) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/3sE3971KYAw7t9ENx8Eqwk)

__Introduction:__
Who-ya Extended is a Japanese creative unit centered around the vocalist フーヤ (Who-ya).

__Biography:__
The unit first debuted in anime by performing the opening theme song titled "[Qvism](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zo5Q5ea1WDw)" in the TV anime [Psycho-Pass 3](https://anilist.co/anime/108307/PSYCHOPASS-3/), which started broadcasting on Fuji TV's "noitaminA" television block on October 24, 2019. A month later the unit made their major debut by releasing a full version of the single.

The unit would soon reappear in the sequel movie [Psycho-Pass 3: First Inspector](https://anilist.co/anime/113917/PSYCHOPASS-3-First-Inspector-/), with a brand new single titled "[Synthetic Sympathy](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y9PRpTiZvco)". The full version of the song was released and available for digital purchase on March 9, 2020.

(Source; [Who-ya Extended's Official Website](https://www.wyxt.info/profile/), edited)
Affiliated with [WIT Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858/).

[Profile (TINYVOICE)](https://www.tinyvoice.com/works/?category=akira) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/AKIRA_(PALM_DRIVE))

AKIRA is a music producer under TINYVOICE PRODUCTION. He started a musical project in 2002 called "PALM DRIVE".

[Profile (TINYVOICE)](https://www.tinyvoice.com/works/?category=uta) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/utatvp) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/utatvp)

UTA is a music producer under TINYVOICE PRODUCTION.

クロスアンジュ 天使と竜の輪舞
キミと僕の最後の戦場、あるいは世界が始まる聖戦
とある魔術の禁書目録
とある科学の超電磁砲
ハズレ枠の【状態異常スキル】で最強になった俺がすべてを蹂躙するまで
不遇職【鑑定士】が実は最強だった～奈落で鍛えた最強の【神眼】で無双する～
学戦都市アスタリスク
落第騎士の英雄譚（キャバルリィ）
